{
  // REQUIRED: ID of the selected product (from product list)

  // REQUIRED: ID of the logged-in user
  //  Get this from the login/auth state
  "userId": 2,

  // REQUIRED: Shirt color selected by the user
  //  Use a dropdown or color picker (e.g., "Red", "Blue", "White")
  "shirtColor": "Red",

  // Optional - usually null
  //  Leave this as null if you're sending `base64Image`
  "fullImage": null,

  // REQUIRED: Base64 image created from the design canvas
  //  Use `canvas.toDataURL("image/jpeg")` or `toDataURL("image/png")`
  "base64Image": "data:image/jpeg;base64,...",

  // Optional: Design metadata in JSON string format (used to recreate canvas)
  //  Use `JSON.stringify(canvas.toJSON())` (for example in Fabric.js)
  "designMetadata": "{\"canvasWidth\":500,\"canvasHeight\":600,\"elements\":[{\"type\":\"text\",\"value\":\"Hello\"}]}",

  // Optional: Short description of the design
  //  Let user type a few words (e.g. "Red shirt with text Hello")

  //  Input field: Text

  // Optional: Shipping method, default = "Standard"

  //  Use from predefined options based on shipping method

  // Optional: Notes for delivery

  // Input field: Numeric input or +/- stepper
  "quantity": 2,

  "deliveryDate": "2025-06-20T10:00:00"
